message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, considering it's worth at least $12,000 to you. Let's make this happen!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for your product. I believe this is a fair compromise given its value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500 to make this work.  It's a fair compromise and still leaves a good margin for both of us.  What do you say?

I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $9,800. I believe this is a reasonable compromise and provides a good value for both parties involved.
